3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Welcome to 579 27th Street! This completely renovated condo in 2020 has 2 bedroom, 2 bath + panoramic views is both stylish and practical. The open concept living room opens to a lovely balcony with stunning city views. The kitchen has gorgeous Vermont black granite countertops, beautiful cabinetry with brass hardware and stainless steel appliances. The gracious front deck is ideal for morning coffee or evening cocktails. Off the back bedrooms is an amazing large rear patio. This designed patio is perfect for lounging and grilling. Comes with built in BBQ and gas heat lamps. Throughout the unit are white oak hardwood flooring, appliances including a Bertazzoni Range & Bosch Dishwasher, in unit laundry and 1 car parking in the garage this property is ideal for convenient, modern living close to all the action on 24th Street. Special Financing Incentives available on this property from SIRVA Mortgage. Relocation company will give a $7500 credit for NRCC's.
Confidential Remarks: Relocation company will give a $7500 credit for NRCC's. This is a relocation sale. Additional forms required. Need additional time when an offer is submitted.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Step into the charming & elegant world of 475 Jersey St, situated on one of the premier blocks in the heart of Noe Valley. This beautiful home features 3 beds, including a grand primary suite on the top floor, 2 full baths and powder room, & 2-car tandem parking. As you enter the formal living room, you'll be greeted by a warm & inviting wood-burning fireplace and period details throughout. The remodeled kitchen boasts new appliances & countertops with strategically placed skylights.The dining room is adjacent to an atrium, which adds a touch of elegance and natural light to the space. The upstairs living room opens onto the south-facing terrace, providing an ideal spot for indoor-outdoor living and dining. Newly refinished hardwood floors throughout with new designer light fixtures, adding to its vintage charm. The deep south-facing backyard is a true oasis, complete with roses & a lemon tree, providing a tranquil and private space to relax and entertain. 475 Jersey is located in a prime location of Noe Valley, offering easy access to all of the cafe's & shops on 24th Street. This is a rare opportunity to own a turnkey single family residence in one of the most sought-after neighborhoods in the city.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Showcasing breathtaking views of the city & the Bay, this meticulously-maintained MCM Noe Valley home beams with pride of home ownership. The main living space is equipped with an updated kitchen that seamlessly connects to the dining room and has direct access to the view deck creating a highly sought after indoor/outdoor living experience. To complete this level, two bedrooms share a bright full-size bathroom with shower over tub. The primary bedroom is located on the lower level to ensure your privacy and quiet living and offers a remodeled en-suite bathroom with walk-in shower, heated floors and ample closet space. The exceptional outdoor space lends itself to entertainment, play and summer gatherings. With its grassy patch and multi-level view decks, this is the perfect place for hosting BBQ's, fun games and cocktails. Additional features include hardwood floors throughout, side by side laundry, 1-car parking & additional storage. Convenient location minutes away from 24th St. corridor, Diamond Heights Blvd, Glen Park Canyon, Douglass Playground and Church St. restaurant & businesses. Don't miss this turnkey opportunity in one of the most desirable neighborhoods of San Francis

Remarks: Step into this sunlit, spacious condo, and you will instantly feel at home.This inviting abode features an open floor plan that seamlessly connects the gourmet kitchen, complete with stainless steel appliances and Caesar stone countertops, a dining nook with ample storage, and an expansive kitchen island,to the living area complete with a cozy,gas fireplace.This level also boasts an home office/bedroom and a convenient half-bath. The middle and lower levels reveal 2 sunny ensuite bedrooms, each featuring spacious and luxurious bathrooms with jetted tubs, double sinks, and walk-in showers. All 3 levels offer south-facing decks overlooking a exclusive use serene garden with mature trees, perfect for entertaining or simply relaxing. Added spacious storage area that can flexibly serve as a wine cellar, workshop, or arts and crafts room. In-unit laundry, gleaming hardwood floors throughout, and a garage parking with additional storage. Located just a leisurely walk away from a multitude of cafes, coffee shops, restaurants, Whole Foods, and the vibrant Saturday Farmer's Market on 24th St. Convenience extends to public transportation with easy access to Muni's J,tech transport,BART,and SFO.Added bonus of low HOA dues this condo offers not only comfort but also exceptional value.

The luxurious large Master suite, with large walk in closet, Spa like bathroom finished in limestone, an over sized shower with rain head, and a home office with sliding French doors to the terraced back yard. The finished 2-car tandem garage with EV charger shares the street level with a bottle temperature controlled wine cellar and sitting area.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Modern Noe Valley home exquisitely designed to accentuate grand scale, indoor-outdoor flow, natural light, and panoramic San Francisco views. Built in 2006 and created by award-winning Mark Brand Architecture, the home is distinguished and inspired by cubic massing, well-proportioned forms and harmonious natural materials. Impressive scale and flow throughout the living areas, which include 10-foot ceilings, large windows, and direct access to deep south-facing garden and entertainment/lounge spaces. Bright natural light streams through large, carefully arranged windows optimizing outlooks and views. Rich Brazilian teak flooring creates a remarkable feeling of organic elegance throughout the home, elevating movement through the living spaces. A well-appointed chef's eat-in kitchen offers an abundance of storage and prep space, luxury brand appliances, and a wall of glass draping the space with direct sunlight throughout the year and providing spectacular views outdoors to the deep garden and outdoor entertainment and gardening spaces. An impressive primary suite features a bespoke spa-bath, cavernous walk-in closet, and large private deck with panoramic SF views. Upgrades include rooftop solar power system, Tesla Power Wall, Level-1 (fast) EV charger, and Air Conditioning.
Confidential Remarks: FIRST SHOWING - Sun 8/11 (1:00p - 3:00p). Call Andrew 415-786-6548 for other showing arrangements. Presale escrow opened with Kallie Castro, FATCO.

Ideal Noe Valley location close to Douglass Playground, shops & restaurants on 24th St & Church St, & access to hiking & public transit/freeways. With incredible views, a superlative location, vibrant interiors & tranquil outdoor spaces, this Noe Valley gem offers the best of San Francisco living.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Incredible investment opportunity to own a semi-attached home with a large lot in a stellar Noe Valley location! The main level opens to a living/dining area, two bedrooms, a kitchen, and two bedrooms all showered with natural light. 3rd Party Synd. Remarks: This stylish townhouse is a great alternative to a single family home. The dramatic living space has soaring ceilings, a double high wall of windows, a gas fireplace and custom modern lighting. The open plan is ideal for entertaining family and friends. The living, dining and kitchen spaces flow seamlessly from one area to another. Off the living room, the den is a fantastic place to watch a movie or enjoy a good book. A stylish half bath with mosaic tiles completes this level. The loft bedroom overlooking the dramatic living space is ideal for guests or as a home office. Laundry is also found on this level. On the top floor of the home are two additional bedrooms each with newly remodeled ensuite baths. The primary suite has a walk-in closet, gas fireplace and a view terrace. Accessible from both bedrooms, you can take in the view of St Pauls and across Noe Valley from the sheltered terrace. On the entry level is additional storage and direct access to the garage. This coveted location offers easy access to Noe Valley shops, restaurants and parks.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Discover your dream home in this beautifully updated Craftsman-era residence nestled in a tranquil setting with sprawling views East, West and South. Enjoy cooking in the tastefully remodeled kitchen with quartz countertops, elegant marble floors, a spacious island with wine cooler, extra storage and a sitting area. Natural light pours in through a door that opens to a lightwell with mature greenery. The formal dining room and living room with a cozy wood-burning fireplace are both enhanced by a verdant outlook, each with large windows, perfect for entertaining and relaxing. This level shines with a remodeled bath and two well-appointed bedrooms with breathtaking views. Step out from the west bedroom onto a private deck to soak in the scenery. On the lower level indulge in the expansive primary suite complete with a dressing/sitting room and an additional versatile room, perfect for a home office or personal retreat. The base level features a vast room, ideal as an art studio or gym that opens to an expansive view deck and a cascading enchanted garden, creating a serene escape. This home seamlessly blends classic Craftsman charm with modern luxury, offering unparalleled living experience.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: You'd be hard pressed to beat the location of this truly San Franciscan Edwardian top floor TIC unit. Inside you will find soaring ceilings throughout and tall windows in the front facing living room. There's a lovely decorative fireplace that may or may not be an old Murphy bed! Next to the living room, there is a charming office room with stairs leading from the office up to the top floor finished attic room (unwarranted) that has been used as a bedroom with lovely neighborhood views. Triple parlor rooms on the east side of the house provide for flexible living options: guest room, family room, bedroom - the choice is yours! They are currently set up as a living room, formal dining room and bedroom. The hall on the west side is where you will find the full and half baths, and leads to the spacious south facing kitchen with an adjacent bright smaller bedroom, and sunny laundry porch. Big windows look out to the shared verdant garden with many bird and butterfly attracting flowers and plants. Easy public transit, tech shuttle, and

Public Remarks: Views, views & more views - from all levels!!! Perched on the hill in highly desirable Diamond Heights, this home is truly a diamond in the rough. A little imagination will go a long way in taking this home from high potential to spectacularly stunning! The private and secure entry with direct access from the attached two-car (side by side) garage, sweeps you upstairs to the main floor with gorgeous views from the San Francisco Bay to the Pacific Ocean. This floor offers a large eat-in kitchen, dining room, living room, family room and half bath. On the mid-level you'll find three bedrooms, including a primary suite with it's own private bath plus a hall bath for the other two bedrooms to share. The lower floor is finished off with a laundry room and another versitle family room perfect for an office, game room or for entertaining with access to the backyard which is also ripe with opportunity! You won't want to miss seeing this home, the spectacular views and opportunity it offers.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Nestled in the heart of Noe Valley, this stunning, light-filled, three-bedroom penthouse has been updated throughout. Built in 1966, this midcentury home features a large, open-concept living space that is ideal for entertaining. The oversized living room features a sleek fireplace, large windows and has room for multiple seating areas. The dining room easily fits a large table, has a wall of windows and custom built-ins. The newly imagined chef's kitchen is meticulously organized with stainless appliances, extensive storage and built around an island large enough to sit large groups. The primary bedroom looks south over the expansive yard and has an updated ensuite bathroom. Two additional bedrooms offer space for bedrooms or flexibility to create a dedicated home office or gym. The large, sun-filled, south facing yard has a patio area, dining area and large lawn, all surrounded by mature plants and trees. One car parking, laundry room and expansive storage complete the home. The perfect balance of modern amenities with intuitive layout creates an unparalleled sanctuary for refined living. Walking distance to everything that Noe Valley has to offer, including Whole Foods, Firefly, Slow Sanchez, the Noe Valley Library and Town Square. Walk score of 95.
Confidential Remarks: Please contact Grant Beggs for any showings at (415) 815-9701.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Prepare to be smitten by this 1891 Stick Victorian, just 2 blocks from Noe Valley's bustling 24th St. business district! Inside, discover high ceilings and elegant wainscoting. The living room, with a Victorian biofuel retrofitted fireplace and bay windows, leads to the formal dining room with closet, separated by operational pocket doors. Two bedrooms line the right side of the hallway. The kitchen features a walk-in pantry, chef's Viking stove, and plenty of counter space. A striking family room, added with permits as part of a horizontal addition in 2004, offers neighborhood hill and garden views. A full bathroom with walk-in shower completes this level. There are exterior stairs off the family room that lead to a flat and lush, yet amazingly low-maintenance, yard. The ground level has another bedroom/office room with garden outlooks, a full bathroom, laundry closet, ample storage, and garage parking (with an additional spot in the driveway). This home seamlessly blends historical charm with modern updates, including copper piping, no knob and tube, solar panels, and a Tesla Powerwall. Enjoy easy access to shops, transit, tech shuttles, and Sanchez Slow Street'' where you can leisurely make your way among bikers, strollers, rollers, and walkers from 24th St. to 30th St.
Confidential Remarks: Offers at 10am Wednesday, May 15th. Please text/call me at 415.601.9111 with any questions. Email amanda@realestatesf.com or text me for Disclosure Package Tax records show the house as 1354 Sq. Ft., floorplan Graphic Artist shows 1798, Appraisal is 1162 and doesn't take into account any of the permitted space on the lower level due to exterior staircase. Owner was told there was no knob and tube when she purchased the property and electrical had been updated prior to her ownership in 1981. Horizontal addition in rear was completed with permits in 2004. There is a security system that is owned but not currently active.
Directions to Property: Ok to park in driveway or neighboring driveway at

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Enjoy a unique living experience in this Noe Valley contemporary condominium in a 2002 two-unit building. With a house-like layout, the main level hosts a spacious living area while the top floor features three bedrooms and two bathrooms. The open living/dining/kitchen area, with its 10-foot ceiling height and rare-to-find volume, is an entertainer's dream. The Chef's kitchen comes with stainless steel appliances, a stone countertop, and a breakfast bar. Natural light floods the space highlighting the oak hardwood floors. Two gas-burning fireplaces add warmth and ambiance. The primary bedroom features a comfortable sitting area, a walk-in closet, and a spa-like bathroom offering a jet tub and shower. Additional bedrooms provide ample space and tranquility. A light-filled landing offers a perfect spot for a home office. The private rooftop deck showcases stunning views of Noe Valley, Bernal Heights, and the Bay. A spacious side-by-side 1-car garage also provides ample storage. Located in vibrant west Noe Valley, just steps from slow-traffic Sanchez St and amenities such as the Day St Rec Center & Dog's Park, and Church St shops and restaurants, with easy access to highways and public transportation, this condominium epitomizes modern city living.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Transparent Price! Top floor Nordic Sky House in a boutique 2-unit bldg, exquisitely redesigned by its European owner with Smart Home features & custom details. Perfect for the design connoisseur. The DR offers direct access to a large private deck ideal for alfresco dining w/spectacular VIEWS of downtown. Enjoy the same views from multiple rooms inside the house. Entertain in style around the firepit on the exclusive use roofdeck w/360-degree panoramic VIEWS. 2 beds + 2 baths + 2-car pkg. Electric skylight, custom cabs & built-ins, quality appliances, shadowline baseboards, mood lighting, ethernet, 1 GB Fiber, extra insulation, owned solar panels, heat pump HVAC/AC. EV-ready, Tesla Powerwall, white oak floors, storage room, in-unit w/d. Windows on 4 sides. Call for impressive list of updates too numerous to mention here. Sweet location in Noe Valley steps away from Slow Sanchez & Noe Cafe. Seeing is believing: call for a private showing & experience this very special turn-key home.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Perched on top of the world, you'll never tire of the bay/territorial views from this ultimate grown-up tree-house. Nature, privacy & unobstructed light exist right above one of the most vibrant neighborhoods in SF. This part of Valley St. ends in a cul-de-sac where lush trees, birds, owls & the occasional raccoon provide the antidote to city life. Oak floors, beautiful white walls, quality but subtle high-end finishes & the infusion of natural light create a warmth & modernity to this home. With 10' ceilings, the living/dining area creates a grand space. The dining area is nestled in the huge picture window so that you'll catch the changing light at every meal & the living room is wide w/ a wall of Bay windows overlooking the lush trees. The kitchen is top notch w/ high-end appliances, quartz counters, pantry, waterfall island & access to a deck. A spacious bdrm & full bath are also on this level. The primary en-suite + 3rd bdrm are on the lower level. The primary is spacious enough for a king bed, sitting area, spa-like bath & huge walk-in closet. Doors lead to a lg deck & beautiful garden. Tucked at the end of the garden is the coolest cottage w/ full bath. Recently updated/lega
Confidential Remarks: For showings, contact Shane (415.225.5990) or Julie (415.730.6387). Visit www.TopOfTheValley.com for more info and photos. Email Team@DomicileProperties.com for disclosures and showings. Escrow open with Gerrie Brindley at Chicago Title.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Situated on the top floors of a boutique 3-unit building, this immaculate two-level residence feels like a modern single-family home with 3 bedrooms, 2.5 bathrooms, and 4 desirable outdoor spaces. In the formal living room, you are greeted by a wood-burning fireplace, a bar area with a built-in wine fridge, and a wall of windows leading to an expansive north-facing terrace with sweeping views of downtown San Francisco and Twin Peaks that extend to Angel Island. A second terrace is tucked between the formal living room and the kitchen. The open-concept kitchen, family, and dining room boast a Thermador gas range, black granite counters, a center island with sink, a large pantry, a powder room, and access to a south-facing terrace overlooking a hillside park. Upstairs, enjoy three spacious bedrooms, including an incredible primary suite with cathedral ceilings, dramatic windows showcasing endless views, ample closet space, and a spa-like bathroom with a skylight, Carrera marble counters, dual sinks, and a walk-in shower. The guest bedrooms offer outdoor access, a shared full bathroom, and one has a walk-in closet. Laundry is also on the second level. There is a deeded parking spot an
Confidential Remarks: Pre-Escrow opened with Bethe Battalio @ Fidelity National Title, FSFM-006230019. Easy to show, contact Mike for instructions.

The guest bedrooms offer outdoor access, a shared full bathroom, and one has a walk-in closet. Laundry is also on the second level. There is a deeded parking spot and storage in the garage. Just a few short blocks to 24th street in the heart of Noe Valley

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Welcome to this stunning luxury remodeled home perched in the heart of Noe Valley. 667 28th Street offers 3 bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms, and a harmonious blend of modern design, comfort, and functionality. The main level great room is a dramatic showpiece, featuring soaring high ceilings, vibrant natural light, superb downtown San Francisco views, and a remodeled open kitchen with dazzling white quartz counters. The spacious primary suite is a haven of tranquility, boasting a sitting area, built-in closets, a luxurious bathroom, and direct backyard access. Two generously proportioned guest bedrooms also offer direct backyard access. The beautifully landscaped flat garden features a large artificial turf lawn and seating area. Located in the highly sought after neighborhood of Noe Valley, this home provides easy access to an abundance of gourmet restaurants, lively cafes, trendy boutiques, and picturesque parks, making it the perfect urban oasis.
Confidential Remarks: Seller requests any offers to be submitted on Wednesday, March 29th by 12noon. Please allow 24 hours for a response from out of area Seller. Email fulfordgroup@sothebyshomes.com for ALL showing requests and do NOT send Text Messages or use Showing Time. www.ModernOn28th.com Escrow opened with Kevin Thompson of First American. Buyer to satisfy themselves with sqft measurements and parking. Floorplan Visuals measured at 1,855sqft. Please use most current SFAR Purchase Contract, allow 24 hours to respond, include fully executed disclosure package, and 1 business day for the initial deposit.
